Inside Macintosh: Advanced Color Imaging Reference /
Chapter 1 - Palette Manager Reference /
Palette Manager Functions / Interacting With the Window Manager

SetPaletteUpdates

Sets the update attribute of a palette.

pascal void SetPaletteUpdates(
PaletteHandle p,
short updates);
p
A handle to the palette.
updates
One of the update constants (page 1-4) for the NSetPalette function.
